law.catch_line: Persons not to act for unauthorized insurance company nor to make false statement or return.
law.text: No person shall act or assume to act in this state as agent for any such insurance carrier whose authority to do business in this state has been suspended, while such suspension remains in force. No person shall willfully make a false or fraudulent statement of the business or condition of or false return concerning any such insurance carrier.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4968-5.
